titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the hand enrollment of the budget reconciliation bill and of the full-year continuing resolution for fiscal year 1988.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/16/1987--Introduced. Waives the requirement that the enrollment of H.R. 3545 (or any other bill providing for reconciliation pursuant to the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY 1988) and of H.J. Res. 395 (or any other joint resolution making continuing appropriations for FY 1988) be printed on parchment.
